ticket.title: Oracle generates invalid SQL for BLOB/CLOB definition
ticket.original-body: If a BLOB or CLOB has a length/limit, the Oracle adapter will generate invalid SQL for Oracle: BLOB(123) is not valid. The solution is probably to override type_to_sql and handle limit specifically.
